name: attistech
title: Atti's Bonus Tech
author: attitude12
description: This mod is in beta testing!!! Beneficial bonuses for the player. You can enable/disable everything, set a fixed bonus for everything disabling researching that bonus and set them to your liking. Includes 19 bonuses in total(crafting, mining, reach, lab speed&productivity, ammo speed&damage, inventory size, reach distance, etc. More will be added gradually.
